manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Lexani Tires: Efficient, comfortable tires for real enthusiasts At Lexani Tires, it's not just about providing superior performance and cutting-edge design for your car — it's about giving you the best possible driving experience in a sustainable way! Each of their tires is designed to provide a fuel efficiency and quiet, comfortable ride, so you can be sure that when you're on the road, you can trust Lexani is doing their part to keep Mother Nature happy. In addition, their tire longevity means that they will stay with you through every twist and turn of life's journey. Whether you want to cruise in style or crave upgraded performance, Lexani Tires makes sure you get the ride of your dreams.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: Put these tires on my 370z (front tires) and they are good. Good tread and good traction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth, quiet and grippy
reviews.reviewText: 2017 Kia Soul! 1.6TThis is only an initial impression, as the tires were just installed today, after a two week fiasco in which I've decided to make an effort to never use FedEx again. Such an incompetent company.Anyway, to the tires. My initial impression, at speeds up to about 50 mph, is that they are smoother, quieter, and considerably grippier than the mediocre OEM Nexen CP671 tires they replaced. They have very good response and bite at initial turn-in and very linear grip and response throughout the turn. They have a very nicely refined feel and ride.I can not speak to wet traction or how they ride on the highway yet, or longevity, but I will update this review after I put some miles on them and experience a wider range of driving conditions. But for the price of these tires and the apparent quality that my initial impression suggests, you can't go wrong with them and I definitely recommend them as a great budget alternative to the overpriced big-name brands.*Update*- I have now had several opportunities to drive in the rain, including one torrential downpour. These tires have far better wet traction than the OEM tires that I replaced, in fact they don't seem to lose any significant amount of grip compared to dry pavement. And no hint of hydroplaning up to about 50 mph in rain so hard you can barely see to drive. I'm liking these tires more and more.*2cnd edit* At my first the rotation at 5000 miles, the tires have lost 2/32 on the fronts and 1/32 on the rears. At this wear rate I should get 20k miles or a little more before they need replacing. I consider this to be very adequate for UHP tires.Also, having now taken several long highway trips, a pleasant surprise was that my fuel mileage actually increased by about 2 miles per gallon. Again, I don't think you'll be disappointed with these tires.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10,000 miles and still great tires
reviews.reviewText: Had these tires installed on a AWD 2017 Infiniti QX50. These were road forced balanced I am almost 5000 miles and will have them rebalanced when they are rotated. But so far they perform well at all speeds and they have been up to 135mph and handled very well. Driven in some very heavy rain and no issues with hydroplaning. Road noise is not bad. And at 5000 miles on them they still look new. Cornering is very good and handling is very good as well. But as far as quality I like em. Don’t be afraid to put these on your vehicle. Good price and exceptional value for the money. Edit 2/04/24 Have around 10,000 miles on em and they are wearing very well. Still look new. I have driven in heavy rain and some snow with absolutely no issues. I have had these tires up to 140mph and they handle great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars a bit loud
reviews.reviewText: good cheap tire but a bit more road noise than my old set

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The price is RIGHT! The quality is even better!
reviews.reviewText: When shopping for tires for my Audi, I was exhausted with prices over $800 just for two tires. My old service Director mentioned he bought these exact same tires for his BMW X6 and that the reviews were good and accurate. Didn’t feel a difference in drivetrain tires look great love the deep treads. Looking forward to buying more at such a great price. I got these four tires for 100 of dollars less than what two would’ve cost me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I liked that they set it up with Mavis Tire for installation in Eggharbor township NJ.They were fantastic!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Delightfully disappointed. I wanted cheap tires. I got quality tires.
reviews.reviewText: I wanted these tires for a show car. I like the style, wanted something directional and cheap.I also wanted them to perform poorly, allowing me to do fun car things more easily. Cheap Amazon tires? Probably low quality.Unfortunately, these tires are actually considerably grippy in dry and wet conditions. I even took them up to a considerable speed through a dip on a highway where around 1-2 inches of water had collected, knowing they would hydroplane, and just wanting to screw around a bit...HOWEVER... either they cut deep enough into the water to provide enough lateral force in the water (like a rudder) to give me sufficient control of the vehicle, or they just cut through the water entirely and didn't hydroplane at all.I wanted to slide around more easily, and instead, now I'm super glued to the road unless I'm at WOT or steering lock. Absolutely the best quality street tires for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these tires expecting them to be okay, I also live up in Minnesota where it’s cold snowy and not the best driving conditions and these tires give me great traction with snow, wet icy conditions, rain, you name it these tires are quiet, smooth grippy tires that handle very well. You can’t beat the price. 10/10 recommend for all conditions.
